alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:25AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Taylor County through 300 AM CDT... At 222 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Jump River to 8 miles northwest of Owen. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Frequent lightning. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Medford, Chelsea and Westboro around 240 AM CDT. Rib Lake around 250 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
